Package org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.load

Exceptions in this package are thrown when errors occur in the org.tmotte.tmplz.load package.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbstractLoadException
    This acts as the base class for all exceptions in this package.
    CannotLoadFileException
    Thrown when an FileTextLoader cannot load a file for unknown reasons.
    CannotLoadURLException
    Thrown when an URLTextLoader cannot load a URL for unknown reasons.
    CannotResolveRelativePathException
    This should be thrown by TextLoader.getAbsolutePath() when it cannot resolve a requested path against a given absolute path.
    CircularPathException
    This is always caught by the Preprocessor, and occurs when a series of Include tags results in an infinite loop.
    DependencyCheckException
    Thrown when an URLTextLoader cannot load a URL for unknown reasons.
    FileDoesNotExistException
    Thrown when an FileTextLoader cannot load a file because it doesn't exist.
    InvalidURLException
    This is used to wrap a MalformedURLException or URISyntaxException.
    NoTextLoaderException
    Thrown when TextLoadMgr cannot obtain a TextLoader to provide content for a given Path.
    NoURLForPathException
    Thrown when Path.getPathString() cannot be resolved to a URL & loaded by a TextLoader.
    TextLoaderCreateException
    This is thrown by TextLoadMgr when a TextLoaderFactory.create() throws an Exception that is not a TmplzException.
    TextLoaderFailureException
    This is thrown by TextLoadMgr when a TextLoader.get() throws an Exception that is not a TmplzException.

Package org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.load Description

Exceptions in this package are thrown when errors occur in the org.tmotte.tmplz.load package.
